English: I am going to the library.

French: La bibliothèque est near the park.
English: The library is near the park.
The supermarket is on the left.

French: La station de métro est proche de mon domicile.
English: The subway station is close to my home.

French: Je vais à l'école par la route.
English: I am going to school by car.

French: L'école est au bout de la rue.
English: The school is at the end of the street.

French: Je vais à la plage par le train.
English: I am going to the beach by train.

French: La plage est au sud de la ville.
English: The beach is south of the city.

French: Le musée est dans le centre-ville.
English: The museum is in the center of town.

French: J'ai perdu mon chemin. Je ne sais pas où je suis.
English: I have lost my way. I don't know where I am.
